Author: spookykawaiigothgf
Text: ORS sport hydration tablets from amazon are 8 cals each, you drop them in water and they dissolve. Idk any zero calorie ones, never seen powerade zero in any shops over here. But the tablets are on uk amazon for 7 quid, which is a tad bit pricy but for me they're worth it as I worry less about myself. There's 20 of them and you're meant to take 2 a day so it's like 7 quid every 10 days.
